content.original: Created by the Scientist caste of Clan Snow Raven, Ferro-Lamellor armor is based on the Ferro-Carbide armor used in the Raven's WarShips. Scaled down for use on 'Mechs, AeroSpace Fighters, and tanks, the experimental Ferro-Lamellor armor offers improved protection, beyond even that of the Ferro-Fibrous armor. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Created by the Scientist caste of Clan Snow Raven, Ferro-Lamellor armor is based on the Ferro-Carbide armor used in the Raven's WarShips. Scaled down for use on 'Mechs, AeroSpace Fighters, and tanks, the experimental Ferro-Lamellor armor offers improved protection, beyond even that of the Ferro-Fibrous armor. CASE Enabled
content.content: 纹层钢被雪鸦氏族的科学家创造,以雪鸦氏族战舰上的碳化钢装甲为技术基础.按比例缩小,以便可以在机甲、空天战斗机和坦克上使用,实验性纹层钢改进了防护,性能甚至超越了纤维钢装甲.启用CASE

content.original: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor (cFF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle. CASE Enabled
content.content: 氏族纤维钢(cFF)装甲是车辆和战斗机甲使用的特殊类型装甲.使用钢、钛合金和碳纳米管纤维编织而成,提高了装甲板的强度,同等重量下比标准装甲提供了更多的防护,但是占用机甲和车辆的空间也更多.启用CASE

content.original: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.prevOriginal: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.content: 虽然功能上和标准战斗机甲的装甲类似,但重型工业装甲经过专门加强,以便机甲可以安全的获得三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)的增强.

content.original: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.prevOriginal: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.content: 虽然功能上和标准战斗机甲的装甲类似,但重型工业装甲经过专门加强,以便机甲可以安全的获得三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)的增强.

content.original: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487 and improved by the Clans after their Exodus, Clan Endo-Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. Using zero-G manufacturing techniques that uniformly mix high-density steel with lower-density titanium and aluminum, the process produces a metal twice as strong per unit of weight as standard skeleton materials, thus halving the weight of the chassis, but at an increase in overall bulk. Reserves 7 Endo-Steel slots to halve your internal structure weight.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487 and improved by the Clans after their Exodus, Clan Endo-Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. Using zero-G manufacturing techniques that uniformly mix high-density steel with lower-density titanium and aluminum, the process produces a metal twice as strong per unit of weight as standard skeleton materials, thus halving the weight of the chassis, but at an increase in overall bulk. Reserves 7 Endo-Steel slots to halve your internal structure weight.
content.content: 由人类霸权于2487年开发,并在氏族出走后得到改进,氏族内构钢是专门作为战斗机甲骨架设计的.在零重力技术下将高密度钢和低密度的铝和钛均匀混合,单位重量下强度是标准骨架材料的两倍,以使地盘重量减半,但体积增加了. 占用7内构钢槽位,以使你内部结构的重量减半.

content.original: While otherwise identical to standard BattleMech Armor, Clan Armor incorporates C.A.S.E. technology. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: While otherwise identical to standard BattleMech Armor, Clan Armor incorporates C.A.S.E. technology. CASE Enabled
content.content: 和标准战斗机甲装甲几乎完全一样,但氏族装甲采用了C.A.S.E.技术.启用CASE

content.original: Standard BattleMech armor is composed of several layers providing various degrees of protection and support. The first layer is extremely strong titanium alloyed with steel, the result of crystal alignment and radiation treatment, which is also very brittle. The second layer is a ceramic, cubic boron nitride, which combined with a web of artificial diamond fibers acts as a backstop to the steel layer. These two layers rest atop a titanium alloy honeycomb structure which provides support, and a layer of self-sealing polymer sealant which allows for space and underwater operations.
content.prevOriginal: Standard BattleMech armor is composed of several layers providing various degrees of protection and support. The first layer is extremely strong titanium alloyed with steel, the result of crystal alignment and radiation treatment, which is also very brittle. The second layer is a ceramic, cubic boron nitride, which combined with a web of artificial diamond fibers acts as a backstop to the steel layer. These two layers rest atop a titanium alloy honeycomb structure which provides support, and a layer of self-sealing polymer sealant which allows for space and underwater operations.
content.content: 标准战斗机甲装甲有多层材料组成,以为不同类型场景提供保护和支持.第一层是经过晶体重排和辐射处理的极硬钛合金,但也非常脆.第二层是陶瓷立方氮化硼和人造碳纳米管的结合,以支撑上面的钢层.这两层之下是用于提供支撑的钛合金蜂窝结构和一层使机甲能安全的在真空和水下操作的聚合物自密封剂.

content.original: The chassis of IndustrialMechs is similar to that BattleMechs but uses heavier, less efficient materials and bulkier myomer bundles. The resulting chassis is twice as heavy as a comparable BattleMechs and less resistant to weapons fire, though more suited to physical labor and cheaper to produce.
content.prevOriginal: The chassis of IndustrialMechs is similar to that BattleMechs but uses heavier, less efficient materials and bulkier myomer bundles. The resulting chassis is twice as heavy as a comparable BattleMechs and less resistant to weapons fire, though more suited to physical labor and cheaper to produce.
content.content: 工业机甲底盘和战斗机甲的底盘类似,但使用了更重更低效的材料和更笨重的人工肌肉束,这使的生产出的底盘重量是同类战斗机甲底盘的两倍重,对武器攻击的抵御效果很低,但更适合体力劳动,产成本也更低.

content.original: The Internal Structure of a BattleMech forms the skeletal structure of the 'Mech to which all components are mounted. The Standard Internal Structure of a 'Mech weighs 10% of its max tonnage.
content.prevOriginal: The Internal Structure of a BattleMech forms the skeletal structure of the 'Mech to which all components are mounted. The Standard Internal Structure of a 'Mech weighs 10% of its max tonnage.
content.content: 机甲的内部结构由安装好所有组件的骨架结构组成,机甲的标准内构重量为其最大吨位的10%.

content.original: Developed during the Age of War, Primitive Armor was introduced on the Mackie, the original BattleMech. This armor was less capable than the armor used in Star League and Succession War designs.
content.prevOriginal: Developed during the Age of War, Primitive Armor was introduced on the Mackie, the original BattleMech. This armor was less capable than the armor used in Star League and Succession War designs.

content.original: A typical deep Periphery derivate of Impact Resistant and Hardened Armor with a twist of the Lyran Solaris Spikes, Covering the whole Mech in additional interlocking hardened Spikes to give it an edge during the grittiest of infighting at cost of armor weight.

content.original: A BattleMech’s cockpit is sealed, pressurized and fitted with a lifesupport system. A limited supply of air and water is contained within the ’Mech. If air or water exists outside of the 'Mech, fresh oxygen can be supplied for an unlimited through the filtration system.

content.original: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 陀螺仪抵消了机甲引擎产生的大量动量,并允许精确机动并从稳定性攻击中恢复.所有机甲都配置了陀螺仪,可以升级以提高性能.

content.original: The gyro helps establish center-of-mass equilibrium for the BattleMech.
content.prevOriginal: The gyro helps establish center-of-mass equilibrium for the BattleMech.
content.content: 陀螺仪有助于机甲稳定重心

content.original: Specialist Slots allow a Mech to apply Aftermarket and Unique Upgrades or Weaponry
content.prevOriginal: Specialist Slots allow a Mech to apply Aftermarket and Unique Upgrades or Weaponry
content.content: 专用槽位允许机使用配件市场的独特升级组件和武器

content.original: A Basic Clan Cockpits Sensor Package is a step above comparable Inner Sphere systems. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic Clan Cockpits Sensor Package is a step above comparable Inner Sphere systems. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 基础的氏族座舱传感器包比内天体同类产品性能更高.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 基础传感器套件.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: A Primitive Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Primitive Sensors Suite. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 原始传感器套件.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: A Basic SLDF Cockpits Sensor Package, is a step above contemporary Inner Sphere standards. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic SLDF Cockpits Sensor Package, is a step above contemporary Inner Sphere standards. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 一个基础星联防卫军(SLDF)座舱传感器包,比现在内天体使用的标准高出一截.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: A Society Sensor Package is a highly tuned and refined Clan grade package. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Society Sensor Package is a highly tuned and refined Clan grade package. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by BattleMechs, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 科学家学会传感器包是一个高度调整和完善的氏族升级包.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. Above a rating of 400, however, the costs of building and operating a fusion engine begins to increase geometrically.

content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. Above a rating of 400, however, the costs of building and operating a fusion engine begins to increase geometrically.

content.original: The Compact Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much denser radiation shielding. The Compact fusion engine is 50% heavier for the same performance, but occupies less space in the center torso and is less likely to receive a critical hit.
content.prevOriginal: The Compact Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much denser radiation shielding. The Compact fusion engine is 50% heavier for the same performance, but occupies less space in the center torso and is less likely to receive a critical hit.
content.content: 紧凑型聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于标准聚变引擎,但使用了更致密的辐射屏蔽材料.紧凑型聚变引擎比标准型重量增加了50%,但占用较少核心躯干空间,受到严重损伤命中的机率更小.

content.original: The Light Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to an XL Engine, but uses Lostech energy shielding to allow a mech to survive the destruction of a side torso. The Light Fusion engine is 75% the mass for the same performance, but intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.prevOriginal: The Light Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to an XL Engine, but uses Lostech energy shielding to allow a mech to survive the destruction of a side torso. The Light Fusion engine is 75% the mass for the same performance, but intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.content: 轻型聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于超轻型聚变引擎,但使用了失落科技能量屏蔽能够使机甲在两侧躯干损毁中幸存.轻型聚变引擎重量只有标准型的75%.并且侵入了战斗机甲的两侧躯干.

content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.original: The Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XL fusion engine is half the mass for the same performance. The XL fusion engine is twice as large as the standard fusion engine and intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.prevOriginal: The Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XL fusion engine is half the mass for the same performance. The XL fusion engine is twice as large as the standard fusion engine and intrudes into the side torso bays of a BattleMech.
content.content: 超轻量化聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于标准聚变引擎,但使用了更轻的辐射屏蔽材料.超轻型聚变引擎重量只有标准型的一半.超轻型聚变引擎是标准型体积的两倍并且侵入了战斗机甲的两侧躯干.

content.original: The Extra-Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XXL fusion engine is one third the mass for the same performance, but extrudes into the side torsos of a Battlemech and produces additional waste heat.
content.prevOriginal: The Extra-Extralight Fusion Engine is mechanically similar to a Fusion Engine but uses much lighter radiation shielding. The XXL fusion engine is one third the mass for the same performance, but extrudes into the side torsos of a Battlemech and produces additional waste heat.
content.content: 极端轻量化聚变引擎在机械结构上类似于标准聚变引擎,但使用了更轻的辐射屏蔽材料.极轻型聚变引擎重量只有标准型的三分之一,但是侵入了战斗机甲的两侧躯干并且产生额外的废热.

content.original: A Mech' Cooling System provides heat dissipation for components inside the mech and compatible extension points for additional heat sinks throughout the mech.
content.prevOriginal: A Mech' Cooling System provides heat dissipation for components inside the mech and compatible extension points for additional heat sinks throughout the mech.
content.content: 机甲的冷却系统为机甲的内部部件提供冷却,并更改机甲上外部散热器挂载点的适配类型.

content.original: The regenerative cooling system of an engine uses waste heat to generate power and is part of the Mech' cooling system. The engines integral heat sinks (a.k.a free heat sinks) are not common Mech' heat sinks and use up less volume.
content.prevOriginal: The regenerative cooling system of an engine uses waste heat to generate power and is part of the Mech' cooling system. The engines integral heat sinks (a.k.a free heat sinks) are not common Mech' heat sinks and use up less volume.
content.content: 引擎再生冷却系统使用废热发电,是机甲冷却系统的一部分.引擎的一体式散热器(也称自由散热器)不是常见的机甲散热器,占用的体积更小.

content.original: CASE is short for Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment. In an internal explosion event, CASE prevents the explosion from traveling to adjacent mech compartments. While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.
content.prevOriginal: CASE is short for Cellular Ammunition Storage Equipment. In an internal explosion event, CASE prevents the explosion from traveling to adjacent mech compartments. While CASE does not prevent damage to occur in the protected area, it does prevent it from passing through, helping to prevent ammo explosions to reach the center torso of a mech.
content.content: CASE是蜂窝弹药存储设备的缩写.在内部爆炸中,CASE防止爆炸蔓延到相邻的机甲舱室.虽然CASE不能阻止保护部位内的损坏,但它可以阻止爆炸冲击波穿过它,这有助于防止弹药爆炸波及机甲的手臂和核心躯干.

content.original: CASE II is an experimental version of standard CASE. When an internal explosion occurs, CASE II reduces the damage to the Internal Structure of the installed location, making it take only five points of damage.
content.prevOriginal: CASE II is an experimental version of standard CASE. When an internal explosion occurs, CASE II reduces the damage to the Internal Structure of the installed location, making it take only five points of damage.
content.content: CASE II是标准CASE的实验版本.当内部爆炸发生时,CASE II降低安装部位内部结构受到的伤害,使爆炸对结构只造成5点伤害.
